patthana8.18:1.1_0: Naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.18:1.1_1: Naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavavippayutto ceva nano ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.18:1.1_2: Naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto ca naāsavavippayutto ceva nanoāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.18:2.1_0: Naāsavavippayuttañceva nanoāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavavippayutto ceva nanoāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.18:2.1_1: Naāsavavippayuttañceva nanoāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.18:2.1_2: Naāsavavippayuttañceva nano ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto ca naāsavavippayutto ceva nano ca āsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.18:3.1_0: Naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca naāsavavippayuttañceva nanoāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.18:3.1_1: Naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca naāsavavippayuttañceva nano ca āsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavavippayutto ceva nano ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.18:3.1_2: Naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca naāsavavippayuttañceva nano ca āsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto ca naāsavavippayutto ceva nano ca āsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana8.18:4.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
